channel.title: Lecture Notes on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Lecture Notes on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Lecture Notes
item.description: Code for related simulations and models are available with the lecture notes, some of which may be useful on the Problem Sets. LEC # TOPICS LECTURE NOTES 1 Arbitrage-free pricing models (PDF - 1.1MB) 2 Stochastic calculus and option pricing Code: Quadratic variation simulation (PDF) (M) 3 Simulation methods Code: Black-Scholes model Monte Carlo illustration Code: Black-Scholes with a jump Monte Carlo (PS1, Q2) Code: Monte Carlo with control variates, stochastic volatility model
